name: Six Degrees of Cupid
description:
LEVEL 3 NOTES: BARD IS PERFECT FOR PAX

Congratulations on becoming a Cupid intern

This was no easy task, however your next challenge comes with your new responsibilities.

You've gotta connect lovers-to-be with exactly SIX degrees of separation- no more, no less.

LMB to connect two people.

Made by IntangibleMatter, InscrutableSalma, and Bill Moysey for GMTK2021
